data.title: Griesbach climate: Weather Bad Peterstal
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

>>average temperature by month Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

>>Weather Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

The climate in Bad Peterstal-Griesbach is warm and temperate. Bad Peterstal-Griesbach has a significant amount of rainfall during the year. This is true even for the driest month. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cfb. In Bad Peterstal-Griesbach, the mean yearly temperature amounts to 9.1 °C | 48.5 °F. Precipitation here is about 1267 mm | 49.9 inch per year.

The location Bad Peterstal-Griesbach is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

The driest month is April, with 86 mm | 3.4 inch of rain. With an average of 131 mm | 5.2 inch, the most precipitation falls in December.

average temperature by month Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

July is the warmest month of the year. The temperature in July averages 18.2 °C | 64.8 °F. January has the lowest average temperature of the year. It is 0.1 °C | 32.2 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There is a difference of 45 mm | 2 inch of precipitation between the driest and wettest months. During the year, the average temperatures vary by 18.1 °C | 32.7 °F.

It has been determined that November exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 84.39. On the other hand, it is observed that during July, there is an extremely low level of relative humidity at only 68.86 percent. The wettest month is December (15.93 days), whilst the driest is February (12.27).

Bad Peterstal-Griesbach weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In July the highest number of daily hours of sunshine is measured in Bad Peterstal-Griesbach on average. In July there is an average of 10.6 hours of sunshine a day and a total of 328.59 hours of sunshine throughout July.

In January, the lowest number of daily hours of sunshine is measured in Bad Peterstal-Griesbach on average. In January there are an average of 3.74 hours of sunshine per day and a total of 115.81 hours of sunshine.

Around 2564.36 hours of light are counted in Bad Peterstal-Griesbach throughout the year. On average, there are 84.16 hours of light per month.

Airport close to Bad Peterstal-Griesbach

The closest Airports of Bad Peterstal-Griesbach are: Baden Airport (FKB) 39.94km,Stuttgart Airport (STR) 77.84km,Saarbrücken Airport (SCN) 119.02km

You can reach Bad Peterstal-Griesbach from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (CDG), Birmingham (BHX), Hamburg (HAM), Bremen (BRE), Alicante (ALC), Málaga (AGP), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Ankara (ESB), Bilbao (BIO), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFS), Rijeka (RJK), Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (LPA), Heraklion (HER)
